00047 /**
00048  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00049  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00050  * @return SelfDoc
00051  */
00052 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodReference::explainSelf()
00053 {
00054     CNAnalysisMethodReference obj;
00055     SelfDoc doc;
00056     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00057     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00058     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00059     return doc;
00060 }

00075 /**
00076  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00077  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00078  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00079  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00080  *
00081  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00082  *
00083  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00084  */
00085 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodReference::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00086 {
00087     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00088     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00089     CNAnalysisMethodReference* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodReference();
00090     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00091 
00092     return pMethod;
00093 }

00114 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::runPart1()
00115 {
00116     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodReference::runPart1(...) start");
00117     isSetup();
00118 
00119     affx::File5_File file5;
00120     affx::File5_Group* group5;
00121     AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00122     if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(strFileName)) ) {
00123       Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(strFileName), false);
00124     }
00125     Fs::rmIfExists(strFileName,false);
00126     file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00127     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
00128     {
00129         group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00130     }
00131     else
00132     {
00133         group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00134         group5->close();
00135         delete group5;
00136         group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00137     }
00138     group5->close();
00139     delete group5;
00140     file5.close();
00141 
00142     determineSketchProbeSets();
00143 
00144     // Note that the invocation of newProbes is the  newProbes in Reference, not newProbes in Chipstream.
00145     // All probes in the probesets in m_pProbeSets are loaded.
00146     newProbes();
00147     calculateReferenceSketch();
00148     newSketch();
00149 
00150      // Create temp file
00151     TmpFileFactory tempFactory;
00152     tempFactory.setTmpdir(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-dir"));
00153     m_strTempFileName = tempFactory.genFilename_basic( "CNReference_", ".a5.tmp");
00154 
00155     // Verbose::out(1, ::getInt(m_pvProbes->getCount()) + " Probes.");
00156     file5.open(m_strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE | affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00157     group5 = file5.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00158     group5->close();
00159     delete group5;
00160     file5.close();
00161 
00162     // process experiments
00163     for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++)
00164     {
00165         Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodReference::normalizeIntensities(...)" );
00166         m_pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00167         normalizeIntensities();
00168         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00169         {
00170                 writeIntensities("reference-normalized");
00171         }
00172 
00173         // write out intensities
00174         m_pvProbes->quickSort(3); // by ProbeSetIndex, Allele, ProbeID
00175         file5.open(m_strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00176         group5 = file5.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00177         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Intensities-" + ::getInt(getExperiment()->getIndex()), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00178         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "ProbeSetIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00179         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Allele", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00180         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "ProbeID", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00181         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "Intensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00182         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_pvProbes->getCount()); iIndex++)
00183         {
00184             CNProbe* p = m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex);
00185             tsv5->set_i(0, 0, p->getProbeSetIndex());
00186             tsv5->set_i(0, 1, p->getAllele());
00187             tsv5->set_i(0, 2, p->getProbeID());
00188             tsv5->set_f(0, 3, p->getIntensity());
00189             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00190         }
00191         tsv5->close();
00192         delete tsv5;
00193         group5->close();
00194         delete group5;
00195         file5.close();
00196     }
00197 
00198     // Read back out the intensities, calculate median intensity and write out probes to cn reference
00199     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5ProbeEffects = NULL;
00200     file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00201     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
00202     {
00203         group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00204         tsv5ProbeEffects = group5->openTsv("ProbeEffects", affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00205     }
00206     else
00207     {
00208         group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00209         tsv5ProbeEffects = group5->openTsv("CN5.plier.feature-response", affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00210     }
00211 
00212     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 0, "probe_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00213     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 1, "feature_response", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00214     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 2, "ProbeSetIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00215     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 3, "AlleleCode", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00216     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 4, "MedianNormalizedIntensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00217 
00218     unsigned int uiCelCount = getExperiments()->getCount();
00219     unsigned int uiProbeCount = m_pvProbes->getCount();
00220     affx::File5_File file5Input;
00221     affx::File5_Group* pGroup5Input;
00222     affx::File5_Tsv** pptsv5 = new affx::File5_Tsv*[uiCelCount];
00223     file5Input.open(m_strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00224     pGroup5Input = file5Input.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00225     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00226     {
00227         pptsv5[uiCelIndex] = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Intensities-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00228     }
00229     int iProbeID = 0;
00230     CNProbe objSearch;
00231     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vIntensities(uiCelCount);
00232     m_pvProbes->quickSort(1); // ProbeID
00233 
00234     float f = 0;
00235     for (unsigned int uiProbeIndex = 0; (uiProbeIndex < uiProbeCount); uiProbeIndex++)
00236     {
00237         for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00238         {
00239             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->nextLine();
00240             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 2, &iProbeID);
00241             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 3, &f); vIntensities.set(uiCelIndex, f);
00242         }
00243         double dMedianIntensity = vIntensities.median();
00244         objSearch.setProbeID(iProbeID);
00245         int iSearchIndex = m_pvProbes->binarySearch(objSearch, 1);
00246         if (iSearchIndex != -1)
00247         {
00248             CNProbe* pobjProbe = m_pvProbes->getAt(iSearchIndex);
00249             pobjProbe->setMedianIntensity((float)dMedianIntensity);
00250             tsv5ProbeEffects->set_i(0, 0, pobjProbe->getProbeID());
00251             tsv5ProbeEffects->set_d(0, 1, 0); // Place holder for probe effects
00252             tsv5ProbeEffects->set_i(0, 2, pobjProbe->getProbeSetIndex());
00253             tsv5ProbeEffects->set_i(0, 3, (int)pobjProbe->getAllele());
00254             tsv5ProbeEffects->set_f(0, 4, (float)dMedianIntensity);
00255             tsv5ProbeEffects->writeLevel(0);
00256         }
00257     }
00258     // Close the input file
00259     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00260     {
00261         pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->close();
00262         delete pptsv5[uiCelIndex];
00263     }
00264     delete[] pptsv5;
00265     pGroup5Input->close();
00266     delete pGroup5Input;
00267     file5Input.close();
00268 
00269     // close the output file
00270     tsv5ProbeEffects->close();
00271     delete tsv5ProbeEffects; tsv5ProbeEffects = NULL;
00272     group5->close();
00273     delete group5;
00274     file5.close();
00275 
00276     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodReference::runPart1(...) end");
00277 }

00280 
00281 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::runPart2()
00282 {
00283     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodReference::runPart2(...) start");
00284     if ((m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file") != "") || (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
00285     {
00286         m_mxGenotypeCalls.initialize(getExperiments()->getCount(), getProbeSets()->getCount());
00287         for (int x = 0; (x < getExperiments()->getCount()); x++)
00288         {
00289             for (int y = 0; (y < getProbeSets()->getCount()); y++)
00290             {
00291                 m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(x, y, -2);
00292             }
00293         }
00294     }
00295     CNAnalysisMethodChipstream::newProbes();
00296     Verbose::out(1, ::getInt(m_pvProbes->getCount()) + " Probes.");
00297     newPlier(getExperiments()->getCount());
00298 
00299     m_pvProbes->quickSort(1); // ProbeID
00300     unsigned int uiCelCount = getExperiments()->getCount();
00301     unsigned int uiProbeCount = m_pvProbes->getCount();
00302 
00303     affx::File5_File file5Input;
00304     affx::File5_Group* pGroup5Input;
00305     affx::File5_Tsv* ptsv5;
00306     file5Input.open(m_strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00307     pGroup5Input = file5Input.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00308     int iProbeID = 0;
00309     float fIntensity = 0;
00310     CNProbe objSearch;
00311     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00312     {
00313         m_pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(uiCelIndex);
00314 
00315         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file") != "")
00316         {
00317             if (loadGenotypeCallsFromFile())
00318             {
00319                 for (int y = 0; (y < getProbeSets()->getCount()); y++)
00320                 {
00321                     m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(getExperiment()->getIndex(), y, getProbeSets()->getAt(y)->getGenotypeCall());
00322                 }
00323             }
00324             else
00325             {
00326                 warn(1, "No external genotyping data is available for sample " + m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->getExperimentName() + ".  This will produce an invalid snp-reference file.");
00327             }
00328         }
00329 
00330         m_pvProbes->quickSort(1); // ProbeID
00331         ptsv5 = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Intensities-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00332         for (unsigned int uiProbeIndex = 0; (uiProbeIndex < uiProbeCount); uiProbeIndex++)
00333         {
00334             ptsv5->nextLine();
00335             ptsv5->get(0, 2, &iProbeID);
00336             ptsv5->get(0, 3, &fIntensity);
00337             objSearch.setProbeID(iProbeID);
00338             int iSearchIndex = m_pvProbes->binarySearch(objSearch, 1); // ProbeID
00339             if (iSearchIndex != -1)
00340             {
00341                 m_pvProbes->getAt(iSearchIndex)->setIntensity(fIntensity);
00342             }
00343         }
00344         ptsv5->close();
00345         delete ptsv5;
00346 
00347         if (        m_pEngine->isOptDefined("local-gc-background-correction-reference-method")      &&
00348                     m_pEngine->getOpt("local-gc-background-correction-reference-method") != "none"  &&
00349                     m_pEngine->getOpt("local-gc-background-correction-reference-method") != "")
00350         {
00351             adjustIntensitiesPDNN();
00352         }
00353 
00354         adjustIntensitiesHighPassFilter();
00355 
00356         m_pvProbes->quickSort(3); // by ProbeSetIndex, Allele, ProbeID
00357         ptsv5 = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Intensities-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00358         ptsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "ProbeSetIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00359         ptsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Allele", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00360         ptsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "ProbeID", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00361         ptsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "Intensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00362         for (unsigned int uiProbeIndex = 0; (uiProbeIndex < uiProbeCount); uiProbeIndex++)
00363         {
00364             CNProbe* p = m_pvProbes->getAt(uiProbeIndex);
00365             ptsv5->set_i(0, 0, p->getProbeSetIndex());
00366             ptsv5->set_i(0, 1, p->getAllele());
00367             ptsv5->set_i(0, 2, p->getProbeID());
00368             ptsv5->set_f(0, 3, p->getIntensity());
00369             ptsv5->writeLevel(0);
00370         }
00371         ptsv5->close();
00372         delete ptsv5;
00373     }
00374     pGroup5Input->close();
00375     delete pGroup5Input;
00376     file5Input.close();
00377 
00378     processIntensities();
00379     writeCopyNumberReference();
00380 
00381         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("create-snp-reference"))
00382         {
00383                 loadSnpReferenceFile(m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-input-file"));
00384                 writeSnpReference();
00385         }
00386 
00387     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodReference::runPart2(...) end");
00388 }
00389 
00390 
00391 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::calculateReferenceSketch()
00392 {
00393     m_pvProbes->quickSort(1); // By ProbeID.
00394 
00395     unsigned int uiSketchSize = 0;
00396     if(m_pEngine->isOptDefined("sketch-size"))
00397     {
00398         uiSketchSize = m_pEngine->getOptInt("sketch-size");
00399     }
00400     else
00401     {
00402         uiSketchSize = 50000;
00403     }
00404     if (uiSketchSize > m_pvProbes->getCount()) {uiSketchSize = m_pvProbes->getCount();}
00405     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
00406     std::vector<float> vChipSketch(uiSketchSize);
00407     std::vector<double> vSNPReferenceSketch(uiSketchSize);
00408     std::vector<double> vCNReferenceSketch(uiSketchSize);
00409     std::vector<float> vSNPData;
00410     std::vector<float> vCNData;
00411     std::vector<float> vAllData;
00412     int iSNPDataCount = 0;
00413     int iCNDataCount = 0;
00414     int iOtherDataCount = 0;
00415     std::vector<char> vDataType;
00416     CNProbe objSearch;
00417     SketchQuantNormTran *qnorm = NULL;
00418     if (!((m_pEngine->getOptBool("doDualNormalization"))))
00419     {
00420         qnorm = new SketchQuantNormTran(uiSketchSize, false, false, false, 0, false);
00421     }
00422     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00423     {
00424         m_pobjExperiment = (*getExperiments())[uiCelIndex];
00425         AffxString strCelFileName = m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels")[uiCelIndex];
00426         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData cel;
00427         cel.SetFileName(strCelFileName.c_str());
00428         if (!cel.Read())
00429         {
00430             throw(Except("\nCan't read cel file: " + cel.GetFileName() + "\nMessage: " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(cel.GetError())));
00431         }
00432 
00433         int numCells = cel.GetRows() * cel.GetCols();
00434         vDataType.resize(numCells);
00435         if (uiCelIndex == 0)
00436         {
00437             int iIndex = 0;
00438             for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < numCells; iProbeIndex++)
00439             {
00440                 if ((iIndex < m_pvProbes->getCount()) && (m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex)->getProbeID() == (iProbeIndex + 1)))
00441                 {
00442                     if (getProbeSets()->getAt(m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex)->getProbeSetIndex())->isUseForSketch())
00443                     {
00444                         if (getProbeSets()->getAt(m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex)->getProbeSetIndex())->processAsSNPNormalize())
00445                         {
00446                             vDataType[iProbeIndex] = 1;
00447                             iSNPDataCount++;
00448                         }
00449                         else if (getProbeSets()->getAt(m_pvProbes->getAt(iIndex)->getProbeSetIndex())->processAsCNNormalize())
00450                         {
00451                             vDataType[iProbeIndex] = 2;
00452                             iCNDataCount++;
00453                         }
00454                     }
00455                     iIndex++;
00456                 }
00457                 else
00458                 {
00459                     vDataType[iProbeIndex] = 3;
00460                     iOtherDataCount++;
00461                 }
00462             }
00463         }
00464 
00465 
00466         if (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("doDualNormalization"))
00467         {
00468             vAllData.resize(numCells);
00469             if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("adapter-type-normalization")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization")))
00470             {
00471                 adapterTypeNormalization(cel);
00472                 for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < numCells; iProbeIndex++)
00473                 {
00474                     vAllData[iProbeIndex] = m_pobjAdapterTypeNormTran->transform(iProbeIndex, 0, cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex));
00475                 }
00476             }
00477              else if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("signal-adjustment-covariates")) && 
00478                      (m_pEngine->getOpt("signal-adjustment-covariates") != "") &&
00479                      (m_pEngine->getOpt("signal-adjustment-covariates") != "none"))
00480             {
00481                 adjustAlternateIntensitiesUsingCovariateSignalAdjustment(cel, vAllData);
00482             }
00483             else
00484             {
00485                 for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < numCells; iProbeIndex++)
00486                 {
00487                     vAllData[iProbeIndex] = cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex);
00488                 }
00489             }
00490         }
00491         else
00492         {
00493             vSNPData.resize(iSNPDataCount);
00494             vCNData.resize(iCNDataCount);
00495             int iSNPIndex = 0;
00496             int iCNIndex = 0;
00497 
00498             if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("adapter-type-normalization")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization")))
00499             {
00500 
00501               adapterTypeNormalization(cel);
00502                 for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < numCells; iProbeIndex++)
00503                 {
00504                     if (vDataType[iProbeIndex] == 1)
00505                     {
00506                         vSNPData[iSNPIndex] = m_pobjAdapterTypeNormTran->transform(iProbeIndex, 0, cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex));
00507                         iSNPIndex++;
00508                     }
00509                     else if (vDataType[iProbeIndex] == 2)
00510                     {
00511                         vCNData[iCNIndex] = m_pobjAdapterTypeNormTran->transform(iProbeIndex, 0, cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex));
00512                         iCNIndex++;
00513                     }
00514                 }
00515             }
00516             else if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("signal-adjustment-covariates")) && 
00517                      (m_pEngine->getOpt("signal-adjustment-covariates") != "") &&
00518                      (m_pEngine->getOpt("signal-adjustment-covariates") != "none"))
00519             {
00520                vAllData.resize(numCells);
00521                adjustAlternateIntensitiesUsingCovariateSignalAdjustment(cel, vAllData);
00522                 for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < numCells; iProbeIndex++)
00523                 {
00524                     if (vDataType[iProbeIndex] == 1)
00525                     {
00526                         vSNPData[iSNPIndex] = vAllData[iProbeIndex];
00527                         iSNPIndex++;
00528                     }
00529                     else if (vDataType[iProbeIndex] == 2)
00530                     {
00531                         vCNData[iCNIndex] = vAllData[iProbeIndex];
00532                         iCNIndex++;
00533                     }
00534                 }
00535             }
00536             else
00537             {
00538 
00539                 for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < numCells; iProbeIndex++)
00540                 {
00541                     if (vDataType[iProbeIndex] == 1)
00542                     {
00543                         vSNPData[iSNPIndex] = cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex);
00544                         iSNPIndex++;
00545                     }
00546                     else if (vDataType[iProbeIndex] == 2)
00547                     {
00548                         vCNData[iCNIndex] = cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex);
00549                         iCNIndex++;
00550                     }
00551                 }
00552             }
00553         }
00554         cel.Close();
00555         if (!(m_pEngine->getOptBool("doDualNormalization")))
00556         {
00557             qnorm->newChip(vAllData);
00558         }
00559         else
00560         {
00561             extractSketch(vSNPData, vChipSketch);
00562             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiSketchSize); iIndex++)
00563             {
00564                 vSNPReferenceSketch[iIndex] += vChipSketch[iIndex];
00565             }
00566             extractSketch(vCNData, vChipSketch);
00567             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiSketchSize); iIndex++)
00568             {
00569                 vCNReferenceSketch[iIndex] += vChipSketch[iIndex];
00570             }
00571         }
00572     }
00573     if (!(m_pEngine->getOptBool("doDualNormalization")))
00574     {
00575         qnorm->finishedChips();
00576         AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00577         affx::File5_File file5;
00578         affx::File5_Group* group5;
00579         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00580         group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00581         qnorm->saveTargetSketchToGroup_a5(group5);
00582         group5->close();
00583         delete group5;
00584         file5.close();
00585         delete qnorm;
00586     }
00587     else
00588     {
00589         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiSketchSize); iIndex++)
00590         {
00591             vSNPReferenceSketch[iIndex] /= (double)uiCelCount;
00592             vCNReferenceSketch[iIndex] /= (double)uiCelCount;
00593         }
00594 
00595         writeReferenceSketch("SketchSNP", vSNPReferenceSketch);
00596         writeReferenceSketch("SketchCN", vCNReferenceSketch);
00597     }
00598 }
00599 
00600 bool CNAnalysisMethodReference::writeReferenceSketch(const std::string& strName, std::vector<double>& vReferenceSketch)
00601 {
00602     unsigned int uiSketchSize = vReferenceSketch.size();
00603     AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00604     affx::File5_File file5;
00605     affx::File5_Group* group5;
00606     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00607 
00608     bool bSuccessful = false;
00609 
00610     if(m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
00611     {
00612         try
00613         {
00614             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00615             group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00616             tsv5 = group5->openTsv(strName, affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00617             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Sketch", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00618             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiSketchSize); iIndex++)
00619             {
00620                 tsv5->set_d(0, 0, vReferenceSketch[iIndex]);
00621                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00622             }
00623             tsv5->close();
00624             delete tsv5;
00625             group5->close();
00626             delete group5;
00627             file5.close();
00628             bSuccessful = true;
00629         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00630     }
00631     else
00632     {
00633         try
00634         {
00635             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00636             group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00637             tsv5 = group5->openTsv(strName, affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00638             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Sketch", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00639             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < uiSketchSize); iIndex++)
00640             {
00641                 tsv5->set_d(0, 0, vReferenceSketch[iIndex]);
00642                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00643             }
00644             tsv5->close();
00645             delete tsv5;
00646             group5->close();
00647             delete group5;
00648             file5.close();
00649             bSuccessful = true;
00650         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00651     }
00652 
00653     return bSuccessful;
00654 }
00655 
00656 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::newProbes()
00657 {
00658     int* piProbeSetIndexes = NULL;
00659     char* pcAlleles = NULL;
00660     ChipLayout* pLayout = new ChipLayout;
00661     CNAnalysisMethodReference::loadLayout(pLayout, m_pEngine);
00662 
00663     // Initialize the adapter type normalization
00664     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("adapter-type-normalization")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization")))
00665     {
00666         m_pobjAdapterTypeNormTran = new AdapterTypeNormTran(0.8287, 0.7960, 1.4218, 0.9954, 1.63920);
00667         m_pobjAdapterTypeNormTran->setup(m_pEngine->getOpt("annotation-file"), pLayout, 1);
00668     }
00669 
00670     unsigned int uiProbeCount = pLayout->getProbeCount();
00671     piProbeSetIndexes = new int[uiProbeCount];
00672     pcAlleles = new char[uiProbeCount];
00673     for (int i = 0; (i < uiProbeCount); i++)
00674     {
00675         piProbeSetIndexes[i] = -1;
00676         pcAlleles[i] = -1;
00677     }
00678     // Write out antigenomic probes
00679     AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00680     affx::File5_File file5;
00681     affx::File5_Group* group5;
00682     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00683 
00684     bool bSuccessful = false;
00685     try
00686     {
00687         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00688         if (!((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))))
00689         {
00690             group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00691         }
00692         else
00693         {
00694             group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00695         }
00696         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("AntigenomicProbes", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00697         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "ProbeID", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00698         unsigned int uiCount = pLayout->getProbeSetCount();
00699         for (unsigned int uiIndex = 0; (uiIndex < uiCount); uiIndex++)
00700         {
00701             ProbeListPacked List = pLayout->getProbeListAtIndex(uiIndex);
00702             ProbeSet* ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(List);
00703             AffxString strProbeSetName = ps->name;
00704             strProbeSetName = strProbeSetName.toLowerCase();
00705             if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("anti")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("randomgc")))
00706             {
00707                 int iAtomCount = 0;
00708                 for (unsigned int iGroupIndex = 0; (iGroupIndex < ps->numGroups); iGroupIndex++)
00709                 {
00710                     for (unsigned int iAtomIndex = 0; (iAtomIndex < ps->atomsPerGroup[iGroupIndex]); iAtomIndex++)
00711                     {
00712                         for (unsigned int iProbeIndex = 0; (iProbeIndex < ps->atoms[iAtomCount]->probes.size()); iProbeIndex++)
00713                         {
00714                             if (Probe::isPm(*ps->atoms[iAtomCount]->probes[iProbeIndex]))
00715                             {
00716                                 int iProbeID = (ps->atoms[iAtomCount]->probes[iProbeIndex]->id + 1);
00717                                 tsv5->set_i(0, 0, iProbeID);
00718                                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00719                             }
00720                         }
00721                         iAtomCount++;
00722                     }
00723                 }
00724             }
00725             delete ps;
00726         }
00727         tsv5->close();
00728         delete tsv5;
00729         group5->close();
00730         delete group5;
00731         file5.close();
00732         bSuccessful = true;
00733     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00734 
00735     unsigned int uiCount = 0;
00736     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00737     {
00738         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00739         if (pLayout->containsProbeSet(pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName()))
00740         {
00741             ProbeListPacked pList = pLayout->getProbeListByName(pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
00742             if (!pList.isNull())
00743             {
00744                 ProbeSet* ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(pList);
00745                 AffxString strProbeSetName = ps->name;
00746                 strProbeSetName = strProbeSetName.toLowerCase();
00747                 if ((ps->psType == ProbeSet::GenoType) || (ps->psType == ProbeSet::Copynumber) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("anti")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("randomgc")))
00748                 {
00749                     int iAtomCount = 0;
00750                     for (unsigned int iGroupIndex = 0; (iGroupIndex < ps->numGroups); iGroupIndex++)
00751                     {
00752                         for (unsigned int iAtomIndex = 0; (iAtomIndex < ps->atomsPerGroup[iGroupIndex]); iAtomIndex++)
00753                         {
00754                             for (unsigned int iProbeIndex = 0; (iProbeIndex < ps->atoms[iAtomCount]->probes.size()); iProbeIndex++)
00755                             {
00756                                 if (Probe::isPm(*ps->atoms[iAtomCount]->probes[iProbeIndex]))
00757                                 {
00758                                     int uiIndex = ps->atoms[iAtomCount]->probes[iProbeIndex]->id;
00759                                     piProbeSetIndexes[uiIndex] = iProbeSetIndex;
00760                                     pcAlleles[uiIndex] = 0;
00761                                     if (ps->psType == ProbeSet::GenoType)
00762                                     {
00763                                         if ((iGroupIndex % 2) == 0)
00764                                         {
00765                                             pcAlleles[uiIndex] = 'A';
00766                                         }
00767                                         else
00768                                         {
00769                                             pcAlleles[uiIndex] = 'B';
00770                                         }
00771                                     }
00772                                     uiCount++;
00773                                 }
00774                             }
00775                             iAtomCount++;
00776                         }
00777                     }
00778                 }
00779                 delete ps;
00780             }
00781         }
00782     }
00783     memory("CNAnalysisMethodReference::newProbes(...)");
00784     delete pLayout;
00785 
00786     m_pProbes = new CNProbe[uiCount];
00787     int iProbeIndex = 0;
00788     for (int i = 0; (i < uiProbeCount); i++)
00789     {
00790         if (piProbeSetIndexes[i] != -1)
00791         {
00792             m_pProbes[iProbeIndex].setProbeID(i + 1);
00793             m_pProbes[iProbeIndex].setProbeSetIndex(piProbeSetIndexes[i]);
00794             m_pProbes[iProbeIndex].setAllele(pcAlleles[i]);
00795             iProbeIndex++;
00796         }
00797     }
00798     delete[] piProbeSetIndexes;
00799     delete[] pcAlleles;
00800 
00801     m_pvProbes = new CNProbeArray;
00802     m_pvProbes->reserve(uiCount);
00803     for (int iProbeIndex = 0; (iProbeIndex < uiCount); iProbeIndex++)
00804     {
00805         m_pvProbes->add(&m_pProbes[iProbeIndex]);
00806     }
00807 }
00808 
00809 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::processIntensities()
00810 {
00811     AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00812     const bool isCreateSnpRef = m_pEngine->getOptBool("create-snp-reference");
00813     affx::File5_File file5;
00814     affx::File5_Group* group5;
00815     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5ProbeEffects = NULL;
00816     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5SnpPosteriors = NULL;
00817 
00818     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
00819     unsigned int uiProbeCount = m_pvProbes->getCount();
00820     int iProbeSetIndex = 0;
00821     char cAllele = 0;
00822     unsigned int uiProbeID = 0;
00823     int iPrevProbeSetIndex = -1;
00824     char cPrevAllele = -1;
00825     float* pfIntensities = new float[uiCelCount];
00826     int iIndex = 0;
00827 
00828     std::vector<int> vProbeIDs(m_pvProbes->getMaximumNumberProbesPerProbeSet());
00829     m_pvProbes->quickSort(1); // ProbeID
00830     double* pdAAlleleSignals = new double[uiCelCount];
00831     double* pdBAlleleSignals = new double[uiCelCount];
00832     vector<affx::GType> tcall(uiCelCount);
00833     vector<float> vMedianIntensities(100);
00834 
00835     file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00836     if (!((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))))
00837     {
00838         group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00839         tsv5ProbeEffects = group5->openTsv("CN5.plier.feature-response", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00840         tsv5SnpPosteriors = group5->openTsv("CN5.snp-posteriors", affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00841     }
00842     else
00843     {
00844         group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00845         tsv5ProbeEffects = group5->openTsv("ProbeEffects", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00846         tsv5SnpPosteriors = group5->openTsv("SNPPosteriors", affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00847     }
00848 
00849     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 0, "probe_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00850     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 1, "feature_response", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00851     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 2, "ProbeSetIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00852     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 3, "AlleleCode", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00853     tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 4, "MedianNormalizedIntensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00854     if(m_pEngine->getOptBool("pdnn-reference-values-exist"))
00855     {
00856         tsv5ProbeEffects->defineColumn(0, 5, "PredictedIntensity", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00857     }
00858 
00859     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 0, "id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 30);
00860     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 1, "Cluster_AA_MeanStrength", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00861     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 2, "Cluster_AA_Mean", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00862     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 3, "Cluster_AA_Variance", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00863     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 4, "Cluster_AA_VarianceStrength", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00864     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 5, "Cluster_AB_MeanStrength", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00865     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 6, "Cluster_AB_Mean", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00866     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 7, "Cluster_AB_Variance", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00867     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 8, "Cluster_AB_VarianceStrength", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00868     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 9, "Cluster_BB_MeanStrength", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00869     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 10, "Cluster_BB_Mean", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00870     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 11, "Cluster_BB_Variance", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00871     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 12, "Cluster_BB_VarianceStrength", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00872     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 13, "Cross-Term_PAH", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00873     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 14, "Cross-Term_PAB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00874     tsv5SnpPosteriors->defineColumn(0, 15, "Cross-Term_PHB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00875 
00876 
00877     affx::File5_File file5Input;
00878     affx::File5_Group* pGroup5Input;
00879     affx::File5_Tsv** pptsv5 = new affx::File5_Tsv*[uiCelCount];
00880     affx::File5_Tsv** pptsv5Signals = new affx::File5_Tsv*[uiCelCount];
00881 
00882     // Determine Feature Effects, and SNP Posteriors.
00883     file5Input.open(m_strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00884     pGroup5Input = file5Input.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00885     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00886     {
00887         pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex] = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Signals-" + ToStr(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00888         pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->defineColumn(0, 0, getExperiments()->getAt(uiCelIndex)->getExperimentName() + "_A", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00889         pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->defineColumn(0, 1, getExperiments()->getAt(uiCelIndex)->getExperimentName() + "_B", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00890     }
00891 
00892     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00893     {
00894         pptsv5[uiCelIndex] = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Intensities-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00895     }
00896     int i = 0;
00897     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vIntensities(uiCelCount);
00898     for (unsigned int uiProbeIndex = 0; (uiProbeIndex < uiProbeCount); uiProbeIndex++)
00899     {
00900         for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00901         {
00902             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->nextLine();
00903             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 0, &iProbeSetIndex);
00904             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 1, &i); cAllele = (char)i;
00905             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 2, &i); uiProbeID = (unsigned int)i;
00906             pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 3, &pfIntensities[uiCelIndex]);
00907             tcall[uiCelIndex] = affx::NN;
00908         }
00909 
00910         if ((iPrevProbeSetIndex == -1) || ((iPrevProbeSetIndex != iProbeSetIndex) || (cPrevAllele != cAllele)))
00911         {
00912             if (iPrevProbeSetIndex != -1)
00913             {
00914                 callPlier(      iPrevProbeSetIndex,
00915                                 cPrevAllele,
00916                                 vProbeIDs,
00917                                 iIndex,
00918                                 tsv5ProbeEffects,
00919                                 vMedianIntensities);
00920                 CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iPrevProbeSetIndex);
00921                 AffxString strProbeSetName=p->getProbeSetName();
00922                 setSignals(cPrevAllele, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, pptsv5Signals,strProbeSetName);
00923                 if (cPrevAllele == 'B')
00924                 {
00925                     callBrlmmp(iPrevProbeSetIndex, iIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, tcall, tsv5SnpPosteriors);
00926                 }
00927                 if ((cPrevAllele == 0) || (cPrevAllele == 'B'))
00928                 {
00929                     calculateMedians(iPrevProbeSetIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, tcall);
00930                     if (isCreateSnpRef)
00931                     {
00932                         CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iPrevProbeSetIndex);
00933                         if (p->getChromosome() != m_iYChromosome && p->processAsSNP())
00934                         {
00935                             calculateSnpReference(iPrevProbeSetIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, tcall);
00936                         }
00937                     }
00938                 }
00939             }
00940             iPrevProbeSetIndex = iProbeSetIndex;
00941             cPrevAllele = cAllele;
00942             iIndex = 0;
00943         }
00944         vProbeIDs[iIndex] = uiProbeID;
00945         m_pdProbeEffects[iIndex] = 0;
00946         for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00947         {
00948             m_pdChipEffects[uiCelIndex] = 0;
00949             m_ppdPM[uiCelIndex][iIndex] = pfIntensities[uiCelIndex];
00950             m_ppdMM[uiCelIndex][iIndex] = 0;
00951             m_ppdResiduals[uiCelIndex][iIndex] = 0;
00952             vIntensities.set(uiCelIndex, pfIntensities[uiCelIndex]);
00953         }
00954         if (iIndex >= vMedianIntensities.size()) {vMedianIntensities.push_back(0);}
00955         vMedianIntensities[iIndex] = vIntensities.median();
00956         iIndex++;
00957     }
00958     if (iPrevProbeSetIndex != -1)
00959     {
00960         callPlier(      iPrevProbeSetIndex,
00961                         cPrevAllele,
00962                         vProbeIDs,
00963                         iIndex,
00964                         tsv5ProbeEffects,
00965                         vMedianIntensities);
00966 
00967         CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iPrevProbeSetIndex);
00968         AffxString strProbeSetName=p->getProbeSetName();
00969         setSignals(cPrevAllele, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, pptsv5Signals, strProbeSetName);
00970         if (cPrevAllele == 'B')
00971         {
00972             callBrlmmp(iPrevProbeSetIndex, iIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, tcall, tsv5SnpPosteriors);
00973         }
00974         if ((cPrevAllele == 0) || (cPrevAllele == 'B'))
00975         {
00976             calculateMedians(iPrevProbeSetIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, tcall);
00977             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("create-snp-reference"))
00978             {
00979                 CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iPrevProbeSetIndex);
00980                 if ( p->getChromosome() != m_iYChromosome )
00981                 {
00982                     calculateSnpReference(iPrevProbeSetIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals, tcall);
00983                 }
00984             }
00985         }
00986     }
00987     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00988     {
00989         pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->close();
00990         delete pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex];
00991     }
00992 
00993     tsv5SnpPosteriors->close();
00994     delete tsv5SnpPosteriors; tsv5SnpPosteriors = NULL;
00995 
00996     tsv5ProbeEffects->close();
00997     delete tsv5ProbeEffects; tsv5ProbeEffects = NULL;
00998 
00999     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01000     {
01001         pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->close();
01002         delete pptsv5[uiCelIndex];
01003         group5->deleteTsv("Intensities-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex));
01004     }
01005 
01006     // Determine hasXX and hasY.
01007     Verbose::out(1, "*");
01008     CNAnalysisMethodChipstream chipstream;
01009     chipstream.setEngine(m_pEngine);
01010     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01011     {
01012         // Load up the signals.
01013         double d = 0;
01014         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5Signals = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Signals-" + ToStr(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01015         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
01016         {
01017             CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01018             tsv5Signals->nextLine();
01019             tsv5Signals->get(0, 0, &d);
01020             p->setAAlleleSignal(d);
01021             tsv5Signals->get(0, 1, &d);
01022             p->setBAlleleSignal(d);
01023         }
01024         tsv5Signals->close();
01025         delete tsv5Signals; tsv5Signals = NULL;
01026 
01027         // Calculate XY.
01028         chipstream.setup(*m_pvExperiments->getAt(uiCelIndex), *getProbeSets());
01029         chipstream.calculateXY();
01030     }
01031     Verbose::out(1, "*");
01032 
01033     // Now load up the signals by Experiment and calculate the XX and Y medians.
01034     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01035     {
01036         pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex] = pGroup5Input->openTsv("Signals-" + ToStr(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01037     }
01038     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
01039     {
01040         double d = 0;
01041         for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01042         {
01043             pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->nextLine();
01044             pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 0, &d);
01045             pdAAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex] = d;
01046             pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 1, &d);
01047             pdBAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex] = d;
01048         }
01049         calculateXYMedians(iProbeSetIndex, pdAAlleleSignals, pdBAlleleSignals);
01050     }
01051     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01052     {
01053         pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]->close();
01054         delete pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex]; pptsv5Signals[uiCelIndex] = NULL;
01055     }
01056 
01057     pGroup5Input->close();
01058     delete pGroup5Input;
01059     file5Input.close();
01060 
01061     group5->close();
01062     delete group5;
01063     file5.close();
01064 
01065     delete[] pdAAlleleSignals;
01066     delete[] pdBAlleleSignals;
01067     delete[] pfIntensities;
01068     delete[] pptsv5;
01069     delete[] pptsv5Signals;
01070 }
01071 
01072 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::setSignals(    char cAllele,
01073                                                 double* pdAAlleleSignals,
01074                                                 double* pdBAlleleSignals,
01075                                                 affx::File5_Tsv** pptsv5Signals,
01076                                                 AffxString strProbeSetName )
01077 {
01078     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
01079     const bool isCyto2 = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2");
01080 
01081     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
01082     if ((cAllele == 0) || (cAllele == 'A'))
01083     {
01084         for (int i = 0; (i < uiCelCount); i++)
01085         {
01086             pdAAlleleSignals[i] = m_pdChipEffects[i];
01087             pdBAlleleSignals[i] = 0;
01088             if (cAllele == 0)
01089             {
01090                 if (isCyto2 || isCytoScanHD)
01091                 {
01092                     pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 0, pdAAlleleSignals[i]);
01093                 }
01094                 else // Must be SNP6
01095                 {
01096                     pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 0, (float)pdAAlleleSignals[i]);
01097                 }
01098                 pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 1, 0);
01099                 pptsv5Signals[i]->writeLevel(0);
01100             }
01101             else
01102             {
01103                 if (isCyto2 || isCytoScanHD)
01104                 {
01105                     pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 0, pdAAlleleSignals[i]);
01106                 }
01107                 else // Must be SNP6
01108                 {
01109                     pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 0, (float)pdAAlleleSignals[i]);
01110                 }
01111             }
01112         }
01113     }
01114     else if (cAllele == 'B')
01115     {
01116         for (int i = 0; (i < uiCelCount); i++)
01117         {
01118             pdBAlleleSignals[i] = m_pdChipEffects[i];
01119                 if (isCyto2 || isCytoScanHD)
01120             {
01121                 pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 1, pdBAlleleSignals[i]);
01122             }
01123             else // Must be SNP6
01124             {
01125                 pptsv5Signals[i]->set_d(0, 1, (float)pdBAlleleSignals[i]);
01126             }
01127             pptsv5Signals[i]->writeLevel(0);
01128         }
01129     }
01130 }
01131 
01132 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::callPlier(    int iProbeSetIndex,
01133                                                 char cAllele,
01134                                                 std::vector<int>& vProbeIDs,
01135                                                 int iProbeCount,
01136                                                 affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5,
01137                                                 std::vector<float>& vMedianIntensities)
01138 {
01139     const bool pdnnReferenceValuesExist = m_pEngine->getOptBool("pdnn-reference-values-exist");
01140 
01141     long errorCode = 0;
01142     m_pPlier->setNumFeature(iProbeCount);
01143     m_pPlier->run(&errorCode);
01144     if (errorCode != 0) {Err::errAbort("Problem running plier. Error code: " + ToStr(errorCode));}
01145     CNProbe objSearch;
01146     if (tsv5 != NULL)
01147     {
01148         for (int i = 0; (i < iProbeCount); i++)
01149         {
01150             float fPredictedIntensity = 0;
01151             float fMedianIntensity = 0;
01152             objSearch.setProbeID(vProbeIDs[i]);
01153             int iSearchIndex = m_pvProbes->binarySearch(objSearch, 1); // ProbeID
01154             if (iSearchIndex != -1)
01155             {
01156                 if(pdnnReferenceValuesExist)
01157                 {
01158                     fPredictedIntensity = m_pvProbes->getAt(iSearchIndex)->getPredictedIntensity();
01159                 }
01160                 fMedianIntensity = m_pvProbes->getAt(iSearchIndex)->getMedianIntensity();
01161             }
01162 
01163            // 09/14/2009 Walt Short - This is the fix for the 'Known' bug in v2.0 that was released.
01164             // It will insure that the adjusted PDNN intensity number will match between the cn reference build run
01165             // and the single sample runs.
01166             //tsv5->set_f(0, 4, vMedianIntensities[i]);
01167             tsv5->set_i(0, 0, vProbeIDs[i]);
01168             tsv5->set_d(0, 1, m_pdProbeEffects[i]);
01169             tsv5->set_i(0, 2, iProbeSetIndex);
01170             tsv5->set_i(0, 3, (int)cAllele);
01171             tsv5->set_f(0, 4, fMedianIntensity);
01172             if(pdnnReferenceValuesExist)
01173             {
01174                 tsv5->set_f(0, 5, fPredictedIntensity);
01175             }
01176             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01177         }
01178     }
01179 }
01180 
01181 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::callBrlmmp(    int iProbeSetIndex,
01182                                                 int iProbeCount,
01183                                                 double* pdAAlleleSignals,
01184                                                 double* pdBAlleleSignals,
01185                                                 std::vector<affx::GType>& tcalls,
01186                                                 affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5)
01187 {
01188     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))) {return;}
01189     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
01190     CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01191     snp_param sp;
01192     initializeSnpParameters(sp, 1);
01193     setBrlmmpParameters(sp);
01194     vector<affx::GType> tcall(uiCelCount);
01195     vector<double> tconf(uiCelCount);
01196     vector<double> tx(uiCelCount);
01197     vector<double> ty(uiCelCount);
01198     vector<int> GenoHint(uiCelCount);
01199     vector<double> SubsetInbred(uiCelCount);
01200     snp_param tsp;
01201     for (int iCopyNumber = 2; (iCopyNumber > 0); iCopyNumber--)
01202     {
01203         int iProcessCount = 0;
01204         tsp.copy(sp); // duplicate current parameters to keep commands
01205         for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01206         {
01207             tsp.copynumber = 2; // what copy for this snp so know right model centers
01208             if (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->getRawIntensityRatioGenderAsInt() == affx::Male)
01209             {
01210                 if ((p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome) && (!p->isPseudoAutosomalRegion())) {tsp.copynumber = 1;}
01211                 else if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {tsp.copynumber = 1;}
01212             }
01213             else
01214             {
01215                 if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {tsp.copynumber = 0;}
01216             }
01217             if (tsp.copynumber == iCopyNumber) {iProcessCount++;}
01218         }
01219         if (iProcessCount > 0)
01220         {
01221             tcall.resize(iProcessCount);
01222             tconf.resize(iProcessCount);
01223             tx.resize(iProcessCount);
01224             ty.resize(iProcessCount);
01225             GenoHint.resize(iProcessCount);
01226             SubsetInbred.resize(iProcessCount);
01227             int iProcessIndex = 0;
01228             for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01229             {
01230                 tsp.copynumber = 2; // what copy for this snp so know right model centers
01231                 if (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->getRawIntensityRatioGenderAsInt() == affx::Male)
01232                 {
01233                     if ((p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome) && (!p->isPseudoAutosomalRegion())) {tsp.copynumber = 1;}
01234                     else if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {tsp.copynumber = 1;}
01235                 }
01236                 else
01237                 {
01238                     if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {tsp.copynumber = 0;}
01239                 }
01240                 if (iCopyNumber == tsp.copynumber)
01241                 {
01242                     tcall[iProcessIndex] = affx::NN;
01243                     tconf[iProcessIndex] = 0;
01244                     tx[iProcessIndex] = pdAAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01245                     ty[iProcessIndex] = pdBAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01246                     GenoHint[iProcessIndex] = affx::NN;
01247                     SubsetInbred[iProcessIndex] = 0; // null value
01248                     iProcessIndex++;
01249                 }
01250             }
01251             tsp.copynumber = iCopyNumber;
01252             GenoUtility_transformData(tx, ty, MvA, 1);
01253             bayes_label(tcall,tconf,tx,ty,GenoHint,SubsetInbred,tsp);
01254             iProcessIndex = 0;
01255             for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01256             {
01257                 tsp.copynumber = 2; // what copy for this snp so know right model centers
01258                 if (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->getRawIntensityRatioGenderAsInt() == affx::Male)
01259                 {
01260                     if ((p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome) && (!p->isPseudoAutosomalRegion())) {tsp.copynumber = 1;}
01261                     else if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {tsp.copynumber = 1;}
01262                 }
01263                 else
01264                 {
01265                     if (p->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome) {tsp.copynumber = 0;}
01266                 }
01267                 if (iCopyNumber == tsp.copynumber)
01268                 {
01269                     tcalls[uiCelIndex] = tcall[iProcessIndex];
01270                     iProcessIndex++;
01271                 }
01272             }
01273             if (tsv5 != NULL)
01274             {
01275                 if (iCopyNumber < 2)
01276                 {
01277                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, p->getProbeSetName() + ":" + ::getInt(iCopyNumber));
01278                 }
01279                 else
01280                 {
01281                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, p->getProbeSetName());
01282                 }
01283                 tsv5->set_d(0, 1, tsp.posterior.aa.k);
01284                 tsv5->set_d(0, 2, tsp.posterior.aa.m);
01285                 tsv5->set_d(0, 3, tsp.posterior.aa.ss);
01286                 tsv5->set_d(0, 4, tsp.posterior.aa.v);
01287                 tsv5->set_d(0, 5, tsp.posterior.ab.k);
01288                 tsv5->set_d(0, 6, tsp.posterior.ab.m);
01289                 tsv5->set_d(0, 7, tsp.posterior.ab.ss);
01290                 tsv5->set_d(0, 8, tsp.posterior.ab.v);
01291                 tsv5->set_d(0, 9, tsp.posterior.bb.k);
01292                 tsv5->set_d(0, 10, tsp.posterior.bb.m);
01293                 tsv5->set_d(0, 11, tsp.posterior.bb.ss);
01294                 tsv5->set_d(0, 12, tsp.posterior.bb.v);
01295                 tsv5->set_d(0, 13, tsp.posterior.xah);
01296                 tsv5->set_d(0, 14, tsp.posterior.xab);
01297                 tsv5->set_d(0, 15, tsp.posterior.xhb);
01298                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01299             }
01300         }
01301     }
01302 }
01303 
01304 /*
01305 float CNAnalysisMethodReference::computeSCAR(CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet)
01306 {
01307     float fSCAR=0.0;
01308     fSCAR = (
01309         2.0*( log2(pobjProbeSet->getAAlleleSignal()/pobjProbeSet->getBAlleleSignal()) - pobjProbeSet->getMuAB() )
01310         )
01311         /
01312         (
01313         fabs( pobjProbeSet->getMuAA() - pobjProbeSet->getMuAB() )
01314         +
01315         fabs( pobjProbeSet->getMuBB() - pobjProbeSet->getMuAB() )
01316         );
01317     if(fSCAR < -4.0) fSCAR = -4.0;
01318     if(fSCAR > 4.0) fSCAR = 4.0;
01319 
01320     return fSCAR;
01321 }
01322 */
01323 
01324 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::calculateSnpReference(    int iProbeSetIndex,
01325                             double* pdAAlleleSignals,
01326                             double* pdBAlleleSignals,
01327                             std::vector<affx::GType>& vCalls)
01328 {
01329     CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01330     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
01331     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vAASignals(uiCelCount);
01332     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vABSignals(uiCelCount);
01333     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vBBSignals(uiCelCount);
01334     int iAAIndex = 0;
01335     int iABIndex = 0;
01336     int iBBIndex = 0;
01337     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01338     {
01339         if ( (p->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome)  && (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->getRawIntensityRatioGenderAsInt() == affx::Male) ) continue;
01340 
01341         float fASignal = pdAAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01342         float fBSignal = pdBAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01343         float flogRatio = log2(fASignal/fBSignal);
01344 
01345         char cGenotypeCall = -2;
01346         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file") != "")
01347         {
01348             cGenotypeCall = m_mxGenotypeCalls.get(uiCelIndex, iProbeSetIndex);
01349         }
01350         if ((cGenotypeCall != affx::AA) && (cGenotypeCall != affx::AB) && (cGenotypeCall != affx::BB))
01351                 {
01352                         warn(3, "A no-call genotype value is being used for " + p->getProbeSetName() + " and sample " + m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->getExperimentName() );
01353         }
01354         switch(cGenotypeCall)
01355         {
01356         case affx::AA:
01357             vAASignals.set(iAAIndex, flogRatio);
01358             iAAIndex++;
01359             break;
01360         case affx::AB:
01361             vABSignals.set(iABIndex, flogRatio);
01362             iABIndex++;
01363             break;
01364         case affx::BB:
01365             vBBSignals.set(iBBIndex, flogRatio);
01366             iBBIndex++;
01367             break;
01368         }
01369     }
01370 
01371         if(       (iAAIndex < 1 && iABIndex < 1)
01372                   ||
01373                   (iABIndex < 1 && iBBIndex < 1)
01374                   ||
01375                   (iAAIndex < 1 && iBBIndex < 1)
01376           )
01377         {
01378                 p->setMuAA((float)::roundDouble(INVALID_DOUBLE, 10));
01379                 p->setMuAB((float)::roundDouble(INVALID_DOUBLE, 10));
01380                 p->setMuBB((float)::roundDouble(INVALID_DOUBLE, 10));
01381 
01382                 warn(1, "Within the samples provided, missing genotypes were found for the probe set " + p->getProbeSetName() +". No snp-reference values will be calculated for the probe set." );
01383 
01384                 return;
01385         }
01386 
01387         if(iAAIndex < 1)
01388         {
01389                 double dAB = vABSignals.mean(iABIndex);
01390                 double dBB = vBBSignals.mean(iBBIndex);
01391                 double dAA = dAB - (dBB-dAB);
01392                 p->setMuAA((float)::roundDouble(dAA, 10));
01393                 p->setMuAB((float)::roundDouble(dAB, 10));
01394                 p->setMuBB((float)::roundDouble(dBB, 10));
01395                 return;
01396         }
01397         if(iABIndex < 1)
01398         {
01399                 double dAA = vAASignals.mean(iAAIndex);
01400                 double dBB = vBBSignals.mean(iBBIndex);
01401                 double dAB = (dAA + dBB)/2.0;
01402                 p->setMuAA((float)::roundDouble(dAA, 10));
01403                 p->setMuAB((float)::roundDouble(dAB, 10));
01404                 p->setMuBB((float)::roundDouble(dBB, 10));
01405                 return;
01406         }
01407         if(iBBIndex < 1)
01408         {
01409                 double dAA = vAASignals.mean(iAAIndex);
01410                 double dAB = vABSignals.mean(iABIndex);
01411                 double dBB = dAB - (dAA - dAB);
01412                 p->setMuAA((float)::roundDouble(dAA, 10));
01413                 p->setMuAB((float)::roundDouble(dAB, 10));
01414                 p->setMuBB((float)::roundDouble(dBB, 10));
01415                 return;
01416         }
01417 
01418         // If we get here we have representatives of all genotypes so all means can be calculated.
01419         p->setMuAA((float)::roundDouble(vAASignals.mean(iAAIndex), 10));
01420         p->setMuAB((float)::roundDouble(vABSignals.mean(iABIndex), 10));
01421         p->setMuBB((float)::roundDouble(vBBSignals.mean(iBBIndex), 10));
01422         return;
01423 }
01424 
01425 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::calculateMedians(int iProbeSetIndex, double* pdAAlleleSignals, double* pdBAlleleSignals, std::vector<affx::GType>& vCalls)
01426 {
01427     CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01428     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
01429     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vSignals(uiCelCount);
01430     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01431     {
01432         float fASignal = pdAAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01433         float fBSignal = pdBAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01434         double dSignal = fASignal + fBSignal;
01435 
01436         vSignals.set(uiCelIndex, dSignal);
01437         char cGenotypeCall = -2;
01438         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file") != "")
01439         {
01440             cGenotypeCall = m_mxGenotypeCalls.get(uiCelIndex, iProbeSetIndex);
01441         }
01442         if (cGenotypeCall == -2)
01443         {
01444             cGenotypeCall = vCalls[uiCelIndex];
01445             if ((m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file") != "") || (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
01446             {
01447                 m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(uiCelIndex, iProbeSetIndex, cGenotypeCall);
01448             }
01449         }
01450     }
01451     p->setMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vSignals.median(), 10));
01452 }
01453 
01454 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::calculateXYMedians(int iProbeSetIndex, double* pdAAlleleSignals, double* pdBAlleleSignals)
01455 {
01456     CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01457     unsigned int uiCelCount =  m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
01458     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vXXSignals(uiCelCount);
01459     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vYSignals(uiCelCount);
01460     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vAASignals(uiCelCount);
01461     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vABSignals(uiCelCount);
01462     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vBBSignals(uiCelCount);
01463     int iXXIndex = 0;
01464     int iYIndex = 0;
01465     int iAAIndex = 0;
01466     int iABIndex = 0;
01467     int iBBIndex = 0;
01468     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
01469     {
01470         float fASignal = pdAAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01471         float fBSignal = pdBAlleleSignals[uiCelIndex];
01472         double dSignal = fASignal + fBSignal;
01473         double dDifference = fASignal - fBSignal;
01474 
01475         if (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->hasXX())
01476         {
01477             vXXSignals.set(iXXIndex, dSignal);
01478             iXXIndex++;
01479         }
01480         if (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->hasY())
01481         {
01482             vYSignals.set(iYIndex, dSignal);
01483             iYIndex++;
01484         }
01485         if ((p->getChromosome() != m_iXChromosome) || (m_pvExperiments->at(uiCelIndex)->hasXX()))
01486         {
01487             if ((m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file") != "") || (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
01488             {
01489                 char cGenotypeCall = m_mxGenotypeCalls.get(uiCelIndex, iProbeSetIndex);
01490                 switch(cGenotypeCall)
01491                 {
01492                 case affx::AA:
01493                     vAASignals.set(iAAIndex, dDifference);
01494                     iAAIndex++;
01495                     break;
01496                 case affx::AB:
01497                     vABSignals.set(iABIndex, dDifference);
01498                     iABIndex++;
01499                     break;
01500                 case affx::BB:
01501                     vBBSignals.set(iBBIndex, dDifference);
01502                     iBBIndex++;
01503                     break;
01504                 }
01505             }
01506         }
01507     }
01508     p->setXXMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vXXSignals.median(iXXIndex), 10));
01509     p->setYMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vYSignals.median(iYIndex), 10));
01510     p->setAAMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vAASignals.median(iAAIndex), 10));
01511     p->setABMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vABSignals.median(iABIndex), 10));
01512     p->setBBMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vBBSignals.median(iBBIndex), 10));
01513 }
01514 
01515 bool CNAnalysisMethodReference::loadSnpReferenceFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
01516 {
01517         Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodReference::loadSnpReferenceFile");
01518         bool bSuccessful = false;
01519         if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
01520         {
01521                 try
01522                 {
01523                         affx::File5_File file5;
01524                         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01525                         affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01526                         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5;
01527 
01528 
01529                         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("EMSNParameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01530                         double dInputDouble=0.0;
01531                         int iInputInteger=0;
01532                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01533                         {
01534                                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dInputDouble);  m_fLambdaSpacing=(float)dInputDouble;
01535                                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &dInputDouble);  m_fEMSNSpacing=(float)dInputDouble;
01536                                 tsv5->get(0, 2, &dInputDouble);  m_fLambdaStartingValue=(float)dInputDouble;
01537                                 tsv5->get(0, 3, &dInputDouble);  m_fEMSNStartingValue=(float)dInputDouble;
01538                                 tsv5->get(0, 4, &iInputInteger); m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints=iInputInteger;
01539                                 tsv5->get(0, 5, &iInputInteger); m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints=iInputInteger;
01540                         }
01541                         tsv5->close();
01542                         delete tsv5;
01543 
01544                         m_dEMSNArray.initialize(m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints, m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints);
01545 
01546                         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("EMSNArray", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01547 
01548                         dInputDouble=0.0;
01549                         int iRowCount=0;
01550                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01551                         {
01552                                 for(int iIndex=0; iIndex < m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints; iIndex++)
01553                                 {
01554                                         tsv5->get(0, iIndex, &dInputDouble);
01555                                         m_dEMSNArray.set(iRowCount, iIndex, dInputDouble);
01556                                 }
01557                                 iRowCount++;
01558                         }
01559                         tsv5->close();
01560                         delete tsv5;
01561 
01562                         if(group5->name_exists("VIRanges") && group5->name_exists("VIValues"))
01563                         {
01564                                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("VIRanges", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01565                                 if(tsv5)
01566                                 {
01567                                         dInputDouble=0.0;
01568                                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01569                                         {
01570                                                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dInputDouble);
01571                                                 m_vInformationRanges.push_back(dInputDouble);
01572                                         }
01573                                 }
01574                                 tsv5->close();
01575                                 delete tsv5;
01576 
01577                                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("VIValues", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01578                                 if(tsv5)
01579                                 {
01580                                         dInputDouble=0.0;
01581                                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01582                                         {
01583                                                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dInputDouble);
01584                                                 m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(dInputDouble);
01585                                         }
01586                                 tsv5->close();
01587                                 delete tsv5;
01588                                 }
01589                         }
01590                         else
01591                         {
01592                                 m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.0);
01593                         }
01594 
01595                         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDCutoff3peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01596                         float fThreePeakFLD_X;
01597                         float fThreePeakFLD_Y;
01598                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK) {
01599                             tsv5->get(0, 0, &fThreePeakFLD_X);  m_vThreePeakFLD_X.push_back(fThreePeakFLD_X);
01600                             tsv5->get(0, 1, &fThreePeakFLD_Y);  m_vThreePeakFLD_Y.push_back(fThreePeakFLD_Y);
01601                         }
01602                         tsv5->close();
01603                         delete tsv5;
01604 
01605                         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDCutoff4peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01606                         float fFourPeakFLD_X;
01607                         float fFourPeakFLD_Y;
01608                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK) {
01609                             tsv5->get(0, 0, &fFourPeakFLD_X);  m_vFourPeakFLD_X.push_back(fFourPeakFLD_X);
01610                             tsv5->get(0, 1, &fFourPeakFLD_Y);  m_vFourPeakFLD_Y.push_back(fFourPeakFLD_Y);
01611                         }
01612                         tsv5->close();
01613                         delete tsv5;
01614 
01615                         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ShrinkFactor3peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01616                         float fThreePeakShrink_X;
01617                         float fThreePeakShrink_Y;
01618                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK) {
01619                             tsv5->get(0, 0, &fThreePeakShrink_X);  m_vThreePeakShrink_X.push_back(fThreePeakShrink_X);
01620                             tsv5->get(0, 1, &fThreePeakShrink_Y);  m_vThreePeakShrink_Y.push_back(fThreePeakShrink_Y);
01621                         }
01622                         tsv5->close();
01623                         delete tsv5;
01624 
01625                         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ShrinkFactor4peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01626                         float fFourPeakShrink_X;
01627                         float fFourPeakShrink_Y;
01628                         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK) {
01629                             tsv5->get(0, 0, &fFourPeakShrink_X);  m_vFourPeakShrink_X.push_back(fFourPeakShrink_X);
01630                             tsv5->get(0, 1, &fFourPeakShrink_Y);  m_vFourPeakShrink_Y.push_back(fFourPeakShrink_Y);
01631                         }
01632                         tsv5->close();
01633                         delete tsv5;
01634 
01635                         group5->close();
01636                         delete group5;
01637                         file5.close();
01638                         bSuccessful = true;
01639 
01640                 } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
01641         }
01642         return bSuccessful;
01643 }
01644 
01645 
01646 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::writeSnpReference()
01647 {
01648     AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-output-file");
01649     try
01650     {
01651         affx::File5_File file5;
01652         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01653         affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01654         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01655         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Parameter", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 1024);
01656         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%guid=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid()); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01657 
01658                 vector<string> optionNames;
01659                 m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
01660         for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
01661             std::string name = optionNames[i];
01662                         std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
01663             if (vals.size() > 1)
01664             {
01665                 for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
01666                 {
01667                                         std::string val = vals[j];
01668                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01669                 }
01670             }
01671             else
01672             {
01673                                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
01674                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01675             }
01676         }
01677         // dump state.
01678                 std::vector<std::string> stateNames;
01679                 m_pEngine->getOptionNames(stateNames);
01680         for(int i=0; i< stateNames.size(); i++) {
01681             std::string name = stateNames[i];
01682                         std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name);
01683             if (vals.size() > 1)
01684             {
01685                 for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
01686                 {
01687                                         std::string val = vals[j];
01688                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01689                 }
01690             }
01691             else
01692             {
01693                                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name);
01694                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01695             }
01696         }
01697 
01698         tsv5->close();
01699         delete tsv5;
01700 
01701         int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
01702         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
01703         {
01704             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
01705             iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
01706         }
01707 
01708         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01709         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, iMaxProbeSetNameLength);
01710         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "muAB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01711         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "muAA", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01712         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "muBB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01713         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "information", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01714         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "useInEMAlgorithm", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01715         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
01716         {
01717             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
01718                         if(pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()){
01719 
01720                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
01721                     tsv5->set_d(0, 1, (double)pobjProbeSet->getMuAB());
01722                     tsv5->set_d(0, 2, pobjProbeSet->getMuAA());
01723                     tsv5->set_d(0, 3, pobjProbeSet->getMuBB());
01724                     tsv5->set_d(0, 4, pobjProbeSet->getInformation());
01725                     tsv5->set_i(0, 5, pobjProbeSet->getUseInEMAlgorithm());
01726                     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01727                         }
01728         }
01729         tsv5->close();
01730         delete tsv5;
01731 
01732 
01733         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("EMSNParameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01734         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "LambdaSpacing", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01735         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "EMSNSpacing", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01736         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "LambdaStartingValue", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01737         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "EMSNStartingValue", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01738         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "NumberOfLambdaPoints", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
