01739         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "NumberOfEMSNPoints", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01740         tsv5->set_d(0, 0, m_fLambdaSpacing);
01741         tsv5->set_d(0, 1, m_fEMSNSpacing);
01742         tsv5->set_d(0, 2, m_fLambdaStartingValue);
01743         tsv5->set_d(0, 3, m_fEMSNStartingValue);
01744         tsv5->set_i(0, 4, m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints);
01745         tsv5->set_i(0, 5, m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints);
01746         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01747         tsv5->close();
01748         delete tsv5;
01749 
01750         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("EMSNArray", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01751                 for(int iIndex=0; iIndex < m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints; iIndex++)
01752                 {
01753                         tsv5->defineColumn(0, iIndex, "col_"+AffxString::intToString(iIndex+1,false), affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01754                 }
01755                 double dInsertionValue=0.0;
01756                 for(int iEMSNIndex=0; iEMSNIndex < m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints; iEMSNIndex++)
01757                 {
01758                         for(int iLambdaIndex=0; iLambdaIndex<m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints; iLambdaIndex++)
01759                         {
01760                                 dInsertionValue = m_dEMSNArray.get(iEMSNIndex, iLambdaIndex);
01761                                 tsv5->set_d(0, iLambdaIndex, dInsertionValue);
01762                         }
01763                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01764                 }
01765         tsv5->close();
01766         delete tsv5;
01767 
01768 
01769 
01770         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("VIRanges", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01771                 tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "VIRanges", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01772                 for(int iRangeIndex=0; iRangeIndex<m_vInformationRanges.size(); iRangeIndex++)
01773                 {
01774                         dInsertionValue = m_vInformationRanges[iRangeIndex];
01775                         tsv5->set_d(0, 0, dInsertionValue);
01776                         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01777                 }
01778         tsv5->close();
01779         delete tsv5;
01780 
01781         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("VIValues", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01782                 tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "VIValues", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01783                 for(int iValueIndex=0; iValueIndex<m_vVarianceInflationValues.size(); iValueIndex++)
01784                 {
01785                         dInsertionValue = m_vVarianceInflationValues[iValueIndex];
01786                         tsv5->set_d(0, 0, dInsertionValue);
01787                         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01788                 }
01789         tsv5->close();
01790         delete tsv5;
01791 
01792         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDCutoff3peaks", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01793         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "SNPQC", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01794         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Cutoff", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01795         for (int i = 0; i < m_vThreePeakFLD_X.size(); i++) {
01796             tsv5->set_f(0, 0, m_vThreePeakFLD_X[i]);
01797             tsv5->set_f(0, 1, m_vThreePeakFLD_Y[i]);
01798             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01799         }
01800         tsv5->close();
01801         delete tsv5;
01802 
01803         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDCutoff4peaks", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01804         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "SNPQC", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01805         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Cutoff", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01806         for (int i = 0; i < m_vFourPeakFLD_X.size(); i++) {
01807             tsv5->set_f(0, 0, m_vFourPeakFLD_X[i]);
01808             tsv5->set_f(0, 1, m_vFourPeakFLD_Y[i]);
01809             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01810         }
01811         tsv5->close();
01812         delete tsv5;
01813 
01814         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ShrinkFactor3peaks", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01815         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "SNPQC", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01816         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Shrinkage", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01817         for (int i = 0; i < m_vThreePeakShrink_X.size(); i++) {
01818             tsv5->set_f(0, 0, m_vThreePeakShrink_X[i]);
01819             tsv5->set_f(0, 1, m_vThreePeakShrink_Y[i]);
01820             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01821         }
01822         tsv5->close();
01823         delete tsv5;
01824 
01825         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ShrinkFactor4peaks", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01826         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "SNPQC", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01827         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Shrinkage", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01828         for (int i = 0; i < m_vFourPeakShrink_X.size(); i++) {
01829             tsv5->set_f(0, 0, m_vFourPeakShrink_X[i]);
01830             tsv5->set_f(0, 1, m_vFourPeakShrink_Y[i]);
01831             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01832         }
01833         tsv5->close();
01834         delete tsv5;
01835 
01836         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDValues", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01837         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 20);
01838         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "FLD", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01839         for (int i = 0; i < getProbeSets()->size(); i++) {
01840             CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(i);
01841             if (p->getValidFLDExists()) {
01842                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, p->getProbeSetName());
01843                 tsv5->set_f(0, 1, p->getFLD());
01844                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01845             }
01846         }
01847         tsv5->close();
01848         delete tsv5;
01849 
01850         group5->close();
01851         delete group5;
01852         file5.close();
01853     } catch(...) {
01854    throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
01855 }
01856 
01857 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::writeCopyNumberReference()
01858 {
01859     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
01860 
01861     AffxString strArrayName;
01862     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("array-name") == "")
01863     {
01864         if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cdf-file")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("cdf-file") != ""))
01865         {
01866             strArrayName = Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("cdf-file"));
01867             int iFindIndex = strArrayName.indexOf(".");
01868             if (iFindIndex != -1) {strArrayName = strArrayName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01869         }
01870     } else
01871         {
01872                 strArrayName = m_pEngine->getOpt("array-name");
01873         }
01874         AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
01875     try
01876     {
01877         affx::File5_File file5;
01878         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01879         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
01880         if (!((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))))
01881         {
01882             group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01883         }
01884         else
01885         {
01886             group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01887         }
01888         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01889         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Parameter", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 1024);
01890         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%guid=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid()); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01891         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-array-type=" + strArrayName); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01892 
01893         vector<string> optionNames;
01894         m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
01895         for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
01896             std::string name = optionNames[i];
01897             std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
01898             if (vals.size() > 1)
01899             {
01900                 for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
01901                 {
01902                     std::string val = vals[j];
01903                     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
01904                     {
01905                         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01906                     }
01907                     else
01908                     {
01909                         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01910                     }
01911                 }
01912             }
01913             else
01914             {
01915                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
01916                 if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
01917                 {
01918                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01919                 }
01920                 else
01921                 {
01922                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01923                 }
01924             }
01925         }
01926         // dump state.
01927         std::vector<std::string> stateNames;
01928         m_pEngine->getOptionNames(stateNames);
01929         for(int i=0; i< stateNames.size(); i++) {
01930             std::string name = stateNames[i];
01931             std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name);
01932             if (vals.size() > 1)
01933             {
01934                 for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
01935                 {
01936                     std::string val = vals[j];
01937                     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
01938                     {
01939                         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01940                     }
01941                     else
01942                     {
01943                         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01944                     }
01945                 }
01946             }
01947             else
01948             {
01949                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name);
01950                 if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
01951                 {
01952                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01953                 }
01954                 else
01955                 {
01956                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01957                 }
01958             }
01959         }
01960 
01961         // Write the information entered using the ---meta-data-info option.
01962         vector<pair<string, string> > metaData = m_pEngine->getMetaDataDescription();
01963         for (int i = 0; i < metaData.size(); i++)
01964         {
01965              pair<string,string> p = metaData[i];
01966              string strMetaDataString = "#%affymetrix-application-meta-data-info-" + p.first + "=" + p.second;
01967              tsv5->set_string(0,0, strMetaDataString);
01968              tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01969         }
01970 
01971         // Copy over headers from the annotation file.
01972         if (Annotation::getParams()->size() > 0)
01973         {
01974             for (unsigned int uiParamIndex = 0; (uiParamIndex < Annotation::getParams()->size()); uiParamIndex++)

02133         int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
02134         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02135         {
02136             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
02137             iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
02138         }
02139         if (!((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))))
02140         {
02141             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Reference", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02142         }
02143         else
02144         {
02145             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("MedianSignals", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02146         }
02147         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, iMaxProbeSetNameLength);
02148         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "MedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02149         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "XXMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02150         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "YMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02151         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "AAMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02152         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "ABMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02153         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 6, "BBMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02154         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 7, "Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
02155         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 8, "Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
02156         if (isCytoScanHD)
02157         {
02158             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 9, "ProcessFlag", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
02159         }
02160         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02161         {
02162             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
02163             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
02164             tsv5->set_d(0, 1, (double)pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal());
02165             tsv5->set_d(0, 2, pobjProbeSet->getXXMedianSignal());
02166             tsv5->set_d(0, 3, pobjProbeSet->getYMedianSignal());
02167             tsv5->set_d(0, 4, pobjProbeSet->getAAMedianSignal());
02168             tsv5->set_d(0, 5, pobjProbeSet->getABMedianSignal());
02169             tsv5->set_d(0, 6, pobjProbeSet->getBBMedianSignal());
02170             tsv5->set_i(0, 7, (int)pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
02171             tsv5->set_i(0, 8, pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
02172             if (isCytoScanHD)
02173             {
02174                 tsv5->set_i(0, 9, pobjProbeSet->getProcessFlag());
02175             }
02176             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02177         }
02178         tsv5->close();
02179         delete tsv5;
02180 
02181         int medianSignalIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("median-signal");
02182 
02183         // Write covariate parameter values
02184         if (!(m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2") && m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
02185         {
02186             if (!CovariateParams::m_allCovariateMap.empty() && covariateValuesLoaded)
02187             {
02188                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Covariates", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02189                 int numCovariates = CovariateParams::m_allCovariateMap.size();
02190                 for (int i = 0; i < numCovariates; i++)
02191                 {
02192                     tsv5->defineColumn(0, i, "C" + Convert::toString(i), affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02193                 }
02194                 for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02195                 {
02196                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
02197                     for (int i = 0; i < numCovariates; i++)
02198                     {
02199                         if (i == medianSignalIndex)
02200                         {
02201                             tsv5->set_d(0, i, pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal());
02202                             pobjProbeSet->setCovariateValue(i, pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal());
02203                         }
02204                         else {
02205                             tsv5->set_d(0, i, pobjProbeSet->getCovariateValue(i));
02206                         }
02207                     }
02208                     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02209                 }
02210                 tsv5->close();
02211                 delete tsv5;
02212             }
02213         }
02214         group5->close();
02215         delete group5;
02216         file5.close();
02217     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
02218 }
02219 
02220 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::warn(int iVerbosity, const std::string& strMessage)
02221 {
02222     if (m_iWarningCount <= m_pEngine->getOptInt("warning-message-limit"))
02223     {
02224         Verbose::warn(iVerbosity, strMessage);
02225         m_iWarningCount++;
02226     }
02227 }
02228 
02229 /**
02230  * Utility function for reading a ChipLayout based on the options passed
02231  * to the base engine (i.e. cdf-file or spf-file)
02232  */
02233 void CNAnalysisMethodReference::loadLayout(ChipLayout *pLayout, BaseEngine *engine)
02234 {
02235   string cdfFile = engine->getOpt("cdf-file");
02236   string spfFile = engine->getOpt("spf-file");
02237   if(!cdfFile.empty())
02238     pLayout->openCdfAll(cdfFile);
02239   else if(!spfFile.empty())
02240     pLayout->openSpfAll(spfFile);
02241   else
02242     Err::errAbort("No cdf-file or spf-file specified");
02243 }
